data.title: ▷ Sri Lanka Country Codes
data.meta_description: ALL Country Codes of Sri Lanka. → Iso code → Telephone code → TDL code → Currency code. All you need to know About the Sri Lanka Country Codes.
data.text: The Sri Lanka telephone country code is the number 94. If you want to call Sri Lanka from another country, you can do it dialing the number 94, before the entire telephone number. each country has his owm number to identify this area.
